question.text: You are driving towards this left-hand bend. What dangers should you be aware of?

explanation.text: Pedestrians walking on a road with no pavement should walk against the direction of the traffic. You can’t see around this bend: there may be hidden dangers. Always keep this in mind so you give yourself time to react if a hazard does arise.

answer.text: No white lines in the centre of the road
No sign to warn you of the bend
